import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './MovieCard.css'; import Modal from 'react-modal'; export const MovieCard = ({movie}) => { const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false); return ( <>
setModalIsOpen(true)} className="title">{movie.name}

{movie.language}

{movie.premiered}

Visit the offical site

{movie.name}

Add to favorites

{movie.summary}

View IMDB ) }
